title: Banda
content:
What is the font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627064742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1%20copy_5046.jpg)

thank you.
author: miguel1

comments.content:
There are a number of similar free fonts at Dafont, in the Cartoon category, including [Science Project](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627064742/http:/www.dafont.com/science-project.font?nb_ppp=50&text=BANDA) from Robotic Attack Fonts.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks, looks similar but not quite the same.

Here’s the other part to the title, maybe it’s easier to identify?

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627064742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Banda_4869.jpg)

You were right, it’s probably on the Cartoon Category. Here’s a font that looks almost exactly as the one I’m looking for.

[Flintstone Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627064742/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=flintstone&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=CHILANGA+BANDA&nb_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=alpha)

Thank you!

Yes, that looks like it. I missed noticing that one in my scan through them.

- Mike Yanega
